thread.title: BRIEF-Mistras Group Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.03

title: BRIEF-Mistras Group Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.03
text: March 12, 2018 / 8:05 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Mistras Group Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.03 Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Mistras Group Inc: * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $715 MILLION TO $730 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE $187.6 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $178.3 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.19 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.15 EXCLUDING ITEMS * ‍EXPECTS THAT OPERATING CASH FLOW WILL APPROXIMATE $70 MILLION IN 2018​ * IN 2018, ADJUSTED EBITDA IS EXPECTED TO INCREASE BY 22% TO 30% OVER 2017, TO BETWEEN $78 MILLION AND $83 MILLION * 2018 ‍CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $15 MILLION AND $20 MILLION ​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
